ygData.subject: Re: Tergon's Spellbook
ygData.msgSnippet: I got the spell book as well... figuring it would do me no good I had given the book to my  Gnome Enchanter, but I have yet to get HIS Faction High Enough to
ygData.messageBody:
I got the spell book as well...
figuring it would do me no good I had given the book to my Gnome Enchanter,
but I have yet to get HIS Faction High Enough to complete the Quest.

On a Side Note I also gave the Illegible scroll to my enchanter as well....
one day while wandering HighHold Keep, I cam across a Gnome who said he
could translate it. I ran down to the back to get my scroll, but when I
returned the Gnome was gone. I have not seen him since

that's
> >who I think it was from it was so loing ago). Does anyone know what I'm
> >supposed to do with it?
